Charlie Brown Farms.knownFor: “ This Place Has Everything ” Reviewed June 2, 2015 Friends took us out to "the farm" while we were in town visiting from Washington State. As the title says, this place has everything.Charlie Brown Farms started out as a fruit stand in 1929. It's been a landmark on Pearblossom Highway in Littlerock, California since.
